definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: A quantitative analysis of the variation pattern of characters of the Viola variegata complex.
sentences.chinese: 斑葉堇菜種宗性狀變異式樣的定量分析。

sentences.english: The article conducts the research using method of the quota statistics and qualitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 文章運用定量統計和定性分析的方法進行研究。

sentences.english: This article mainly illustrated the application of soil erosion estimation method based on Geographic Information System (GIS) and remote sensing (RS) technology.
sentences.chinese: 研究了土壤侵蝕定量遙感方法在浙江省仙居縣的應用。

sentences.english: In addition, the semi-quantitative analysis by VIDAS image analysis system were carried either.
sentences.chinese: 並用VIDAS圖象分析系統進行半定量分析。

sentences.english: The government rationed food to the public in wartime.
sentences.chinese: 在戰爭時期政府對民衆實行食品定量供應。

sentences.english: Used to weight the flax fiber or flax caudex sample.
sentences.chinese: 用於定量稱重亞麻的纖維或麻莖試樣。

sentences.english: This is a new method for quantitative studies in laser transverse mode.
sentences.chinese: 該方法是定量研究激光器橫模模式的新方法。

sentences.english: The threshed incentive conditions are thereby presented in this article.
sentences.chinese: 並且定量地給出了國企經理的“門檻型激勵條件”。

sentences.english: The methods of qualitative and quantitative analysis of the phospholipids are established.
sentences.chinese: 磷脂色譜定性及定量分析方法的建立。

sentences.english: Quantitative analysis on different proportions of couple of Coptis and Scute.
sentences.chinese: 對黃連與黃芩的不同比例配伍進行定量研究。

sentences.english: Rearing by imprinted birds with a certain amount of human contact.
sentences.chinese: 通過保持一定量的人爲接觸去飼養帶銘印的鳥。

sentences.english: The percentage of nitrogen in ammonium nitrate can be determined by titrimetry with standard NaOH solution.
sentences.chinese: 研究結果表明，硝酸銨可以與甲醛進行定量反應。

sentences.english: The method was successfully applied to the quantitative analysis of carbonyl compounds in ambient air samples.
sentences.chinese: 該方法成功地應用到對大氣中羰基化合物的定量檢測。
你如何來定量衡量變化呢？

sentences.english: Area normalization method was adopted to quantify pentyl.
sentences.chinese: 戊烷的定量則採用面積歸一法。

sentences.english: The colour index of metallic minerals is making new progress in quantitative determination of modern mineralography.
sentences.chinese: 金屬礦物顏色指數是近代礦相學中定量測定的新進展。

definition: to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
rule (e.g. of science)/law of behavior/regular pattern/rhythm/discipline
